name: Uncraft - Erase reality
description:
The Scribes of Truth. Powerful wandering sorcerers with magical scrolls full of secrets and spells, who roam the world helping those they meet along the way. 

You have woken up in a forest clearing with no memory of who you are, what your name is or how you ended up there. And though you remember almost none of your spells, only one remains in your scroll, the most powerful of them all: the reality eraser.

But don't let that scare you. Travel, discover, delete and start again. Help the townspeople by erasing their problems, but be careful, for everything you wipe out will have consequences. Uncraft reality, recover your memories and solve the mystery of Andina ville.

Controls
  • W, A, S and D to move.
  • Enter to open the scroll. Write anything and delete it pressing Enter again.
  • Space tab to interact with people and enter houses.
Credits

  •  Antonio González Brito - Art - @EvanGreatBlue

Made in one week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022 - 1.
